import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update user"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/users/{user}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update an existing user on the system and return the response. Returns the
updated user model response on success. Supports handling of token revocation
errors when switching a user from an admin to a normal user.

Revocation errors are returned under the 'revocation_errors' key in the response
meta. If there are no errors this is an empty array.⚠️Cannot generate request documentation: Call to a member function parameter() on null

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"user","in":"path","required":true,"description":"The user ID","schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"403":{"description":"Authorization error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","description":"Error overview."}},"required":["message"]}}}},"404":{"description":"Not found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","description":"Error overview."}},"required":["message"]}}}},"422":{"description":"Validation error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","description":"Errors overview."},"errors":{"type":"object","description":"A detailed description of each field that failed validation.","additionalProperties":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}},"required":["message","errors"]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
